did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Labor Arbitration Opinions and Awards, 1955-1993

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: University of California at Los Angeles

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Miscellaneous arbitration papers collected over the years by the University of California, Los Angeles, and donated to the Industrial Labor Relations School in 1970. An index is located in box 40.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The folders are labeled Labor Arbitration Opinions and Rewards instead of Awards. Please note that the proper label should be Labor Arbitration Opinions and Awards and not Rewards.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Labor Arbitration Opinions and Awards #5443. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
